title: Why does the Queen look so good in her 90's? We decode her beauty formula
text:
From delivering her Queen's Speech last week at the State Opening of Parliament to celebrating the 750th anniversary of Westminster Abbey's consecration, the longest reigning British monarch shows no signs of slowing down any time soon.

But it's not just Her Majesty's abundant energy that we're fascinated with - we are in awe of her ageless beauty look. At 93 years old, Queen Elizabeth appears to have barely aged in the past few years with skin that looks as radiant as ever.

Always guaranteed to present a timeless beauty look, the Queen is rarely seen without pink flushed cheeks, a swipe of bold colour across her lips and chic, glossy hair- all of which are true to her signature beauty look,...
description: From delivering her Queen's Speech last week at the State Opening of Parliament to celebrating the 750th anniversary of Westminster Abbey's consecration, the longest reigning British monarch shows no signs of slowing down any time soon.
